about.details:
Incorporated in 1998, Command Polymers Limited is in the business of Marketing and Manufacturing Polymer-based products. These products include Polythene LF tubes, Tarpaulin sheets, Polyester Fabrics, and other polymers.

The products of Command Polymers have a wide variety of applications in industries like Industrial packaging industries, Food industry, etc. With its versatility and scale, the company is able to serve multiple types of industries and its scope is continuously growing.

The company primarily engages in manufacturing and trading. Its revenue is generated in the proportion of 67% and 33% from these activities, respectively.

The manufacturing facility of Command Polymers Limited is situated in District 24 Parganas (South). The facility is well-equipped with all the necessary machinery and tools required for an efficient and smooth manufacturing process and easy logistics.

The competitive strengths of the company are:

  • Experienced Management Team
  • Existing relationships with suppliers
  • Quality Assurance
  • Smooth flow of operations
  • Scalable Business Model
  • Our Product enables us to serve diversified industries

faqs.question: What is the Command Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Command Polymers IPO is a SME IPO of 2532000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.09 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹28 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on March 17, 2023, and closes on March 21, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Command Polymers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Command Polymers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Command Polymers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Command Polymers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Command Polymers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Command Polymers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Command Polymers IPO opens on March 17, 2023 and closes on March 21, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Command Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer: Command Polymers IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Command Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Command Polymers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Command Polymers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Command Polymers IPO will be done on Friday, March 24, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, March 28, 2023. Check the Command Polymers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Command Polymers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Command Polymers IPO listing date is on Wednesday, March 29, 2023.
